document_name: Project Document 2014-2017 "Livelihood Improvement in Tajik-Afghan Cross-border Area"

outputs.output_descr:
Output 1: 	Communities in the bordering provinces of Tajikistan and Afghanistan enjoy better governance, access to rural infrastructure and services as well as economic development opportunities

Output 2:	Cross-border communities have better opportunities for cross border interactions, dialogue and partnerships.

Output 1: 	Communities in the bordering provinces of Tajikistan and Afghanistan enjoy better governance, access to rural infrastructure and services as well as economic development opportunities.

Output 2:	Cross-border communities have better opportunities for cross border interactions, dialogue and partnerships.

project_descr: The project will contribute towards the stability and security through promotion of economic growth and poverty reduction and cross-border cooperation in the bordering areas of Tajikistan and Afghanistan.
project_title: Livelihood Improvement in Tajik-Afghan Cross-border Area
